Description
com.tangosol.net.topic
Contains classes that providing topic entities for publish/subscribe messaging.

  • Uses of NamedTopicListener in com.tangosol.net.topic

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    NamedTopic.addListener(NamedTopicListener listener)
    Add a NamedTopicListener that will receive events related to this topic.
    void
    NamedTopicEvent.dispatch(NamedTopicListener listener)
    Dispatch this event to the specified MapListener.
    void
    NamedTopic.removeListener(NamedTopicListener listener)
    Remove a previously added NamedTopicListener.
    protected boolean
    NamedTopicEvent.shouldDispatch(NamedTopicListener listener)
    Return true if the provided MapListener should receive this event.
